display_information.name: traduire-gpt
display_information.description: Translates any language to any language keeping both tone and clarity
display_information.long_description:
🌍 Welcome to the traduire-gpt app – where language barriers become a thing of the past, and communication becomes a global breeze! 🚀

Say bonjour, hola, ciao, or konnichiwa to seamless translations right in your Slack channels! With traduire-gpt, adding a linguistic twist to your conversations is as easy as adding a sprinkle of emoji. 💬✨

🔑 Unlock the power of global communication with your very own API Key! Simply plug it in, and voilà – you're ready to break down language barriers like a pro.

🎉 How to Use:
1. Add your OpenAI api key to the app's home page  2. Type `/invite` `@traduire-gpt-dev` in the channel you want translations in. From there its got you covered

Sit back, relax, and watch as your messages transcend linguistic borders with ease!

🌈 Language Preferences:
But wait, there's more! Customise your translation experience by selecting your preferred primary and secondary languages. Whether you're all about English, French, Portuguese, or any other tongue, we've got you covered.

So, why settle for monolingual conversations when you can embrace the vibrant tapestry of global language? Spice up your Slack experience with traduire-gpt today – because communication should know no bounds! 🌐💬
